Text: The Lesser Antilles (also known as the Caribbees) are a group of islands in the Caribbean Sea.
Triplets:<The Lesser Antilles
1:
--------------------
Text: Lesser Antilles:  Most form a long, partly volcanic island arc between the Greater Antilles to the north-west and the continent of South America.
Triplets:<Lesser Antilles
2:
--------------------
Text: Lesser Antilles:  The islands form the eastern boundary of the Caribbean Sea with the Atlantic Ocean.
Triplets:<Lesser Antilles
4:
--------------------
Text: Lesser Antilles:  When combined with the Lucayan Archipelago, all three are known as the West Indies.
Triplets:<Lesser Antilles
